Rope Coils can be crafted in bulk using String and Straw, and used to descend large drops
These should come in handy
Unlike a Vanilla Minecraft experience, here you can craft items such as a lead

Starting your creative Flow: The Camera can be used to take pictures around the world. Just right click with it, will make you enter the camera. Here, you can shift right-click to take pictures. You'll need paper in your inventory to make photos. Filters can be applied by shift right-clicking with the camera WITHOUT being in its interface. When appling filters, you can also upload ANY picture from you PC. Also, by scrolling up/down, you can zoom in, or out
All my memories: The Album can store your pictures, so you have a collection of them. This can be useful if you're not planning on making your own exposition
Photo Expo: The Image frame can be used to display pictures. No. Item Frames woun't allow you to display any pictures
Want a SkyBlock? Left click for more info
To obtain The Cloud in a Bottle, you'll have to go between y:126-132 and right-click teh air with a regular Glass Bottle.
With this bottle, you are able to place a block anywhere. This can be useful if you want a platflorm at a high altitude without building a large dirt tower just to place your first block.
This ash can be used as a barrier between you and the unholy. Mobs like Wraiths, Zombies, Skeletons, will not pass through it. Keep in mind that Creepers and Spiders, CAN pass!
This backpack will allow you to transport a much larger variety of mobs
Throwable weapons. The quartz version with deal more damage
A glowball can be thrown in the distance to place a light source
When an item is placed in it, it will become invisible
It will rotate the item placed in it, clockwise. The inverted version will rotate the item counter clockwise
Has some... interesting 0_o - uses...
Fire and explosion resistant
Trash Cans can be used to void unnecessary resources
Chess
I'll be patient. Left Click for more info
Yeah. Chess is in the game. To start a round, just Shift-Right Click the board. Customization possibilities will be:
- Altering the tile colors
- Altering the piece colors and changing the move highlight colors

The game is also playable completely without any GUIs, after choosing your settings. You can simply click on the block and play! This game doesn't require two players, but it is recommended to use it on servers. If you are a singleplayer person don't worry you can still use the Block on your own, you just simply wont have an opponent, or you can use the blocks as decoration!
Ok!
Hats for everyone! The hat launcher can be used to share your hats with other players
Crayfish Mail
Aww, you're sending presents. Left Click for more info
You can use a Post Box to send different items to all existing Mail Boxes.
You'll need at least one Mail Box in the world in order for the Post Box to work. This feature might come useful on a server.
Calling your horse. Left Click for more info

Simply sneak-right-click the Ocarina on an eligible entity will claim it, and the tooltip will now contain the name of the entity (according to your localisation), as well as the UUID of the entity. Repeating this will unclaim it; doing this to another entity will unclaim the original entity before claiming the new one.Right-clicking again at any time will attempt to summon the entity to you, even if that entity happens to be in an unloaded chunk. Should the chunk by unloaded, the Ocarina will attempt to load the chunk and summon the entity from it, and then the chunk will be unloaded again.
The Blood Flask
The Secondary Heart. Left Click for more info

The Blood Flask is a direct upgrade to the Sanguine Praetor Armor. It will double the amount of Blood which can be stored on you Blood Bar. It will also double the amount of Blood received from killing mobs. Basically it will reduce the drain speed of the bar when the Blood stored on it is used.
Another feature of the Flask is the fact that it will boost the effects provided by the Snaguine Praetor Armor to their second level.
The see the recipe for the Blood Flask, press \"U\" on the Zombie Heart Stew.
The Ritual will require 20 Hearts of living creatures.
Efficient like Ratatouiile
This upgrade will allow your rat to transfer one stack of items at a time
Samael, The Rat!
The Demon upgrade will increase your rat's base health and damage. It will also make your rat ressitent to fire sources and will give your rat the ability to set enemies on fire
Ratatouiile, but it's Minecraft

Ever wanted to have Remy from Ratatouiile as a pet? Well, now's your chance. This upgrade will turn a rat into a mini chef. Rats with this upgrade, will cook any held items. Besides that, you'll have access to some unique food types. Keep in mind that this upgrade will not give your rat a Chef Toque, you'll have to make it yourself
Early auto-crafting
These rats are really smart. Left Click for more info
This upgrade will allow a rat to perform auto-crafting when certain conditions are provided.
1-The rat has to be on top of a rat crafting table.
2-The rat has to be in \"Stay Here\" mode.
3-A recipe must be provided in the rat crafting table. This is done by placing the output of the recipe in the top left-side slot, right next to that cute Rat icon.
4-Crafting material must be provided for the crafting to take place.

5-Proper material must be selected. If you're auto-crafting sticks and your material of choise is wood planks, then these must be selected for the operation to take place, as the table can use multiple inputs for a recipe. For example, sticks can also be crafted with bamboo, so you'll have to select the planks.
Example of rat ready to craft:

Rat Filter - Black Edition

看！是一只鸟！是一架飞机！是一个……鸽子？

Rats get increase swimming speed and the ability to breathe indefinitely

Pig got hit by Ratidon

This upgrade will make your rat a little faster and, also, will make it look edgy as h3!! If your rat's mont dies, there'll be a delay before another mount will be spawned

The Plague is not always bad
This upgrade will make your rat faster, will increase your rat's damage and make it even cooler while riding
Slingshots can be used to launch blocks from your inventory, in the distance
One coal can smelt eight items. To be more efficient, we're offering you the option of splitting a piece of coal into eight tiny pieces which can burn one item at a time
The Respawn Anchor can be used to set a respawn point in The Nether. Left Click for the recipe
Recipes won't be visible on Multiplayer, so here you go:
You'll need a Necrotic Focus, Obsidian Panes and Crying Obsidian.
The Vanilla Hopper won't be available until you reach the 2nd Age. However, this wooden hopper might prove to be a great starting point
Same amount of logs? More wood
The WoodCutter can be used to make 4 wood planks, instead of 2. It can also be used to obtain certain building blocks easier
Auto-smelting: The Seared Chute will allow you to push ores into the Smeltery/Foundry through a hopper or other item transportation methods

Auto-Output: The Seared Duct will allow you to auto-export liquids from the Smeltery/Foundry with the use of a filter. Just place a Copper Can containing the liquid you want to output in the Drain, place a Faucet on it, then apply a redstone signal to make it work 24/7, and you're done
Netherite Nuggets can be combinet with tools in an anvil to lower their repair cost. They have to be Enchanted first
This whistle will send all of your rats to their home positions which you have selected previously. Rats have to be in \"Wandering\" mode for this to work
The Staffs of RAT POWER!
You can command your rats easier with them. Left Click for more info
The Staffs provided as a reward for this quest, will give you the ability to control your rats in certain ways.

Cheese Staff - You can right-click a rat with it. This will select the rat. After that, you can right-click a chest, or another container to set that as the destination block for your rat. If your rat's job is to harvest crops, it will place all the crops it gathers in that chest. You can also set your Rat to the `Transfer Items` mode and also set them a Container as a place from where they can take items in order to place them somewhere else.

Rat Radius Staff - The Rat's working area can be adjusted with this staff. Right-Click on a Rat to bind the Staff to it. Right Click on a block to set it as the origin of the working radius. Select the Radius where you wish your Rat will work. PS: Try to set it to 1-2 to see how it actually works.

Rat Flute - The rat Flute can be used to command multiple rats at once. By shift right-clicking, you can select the mode you wish to place your rats in. Right-clicking will use the flute and your rats will enter in the selected mode.
Got it!
Underwater is my home

The Conduit can be used to make a liveable environment, but under the water. While you're in its area of effect, you'll be granted with water breathing, haste and better vision. It will also damage the nearby mobs. The Conduit requires a structure in order to function properly. Left Click to see the structure
The structure can be built only using prismarine, dark prismarine, prismarine bricks, and sea lantern or combinations of these blocks.
Thermal Explosives
These TNTs are provided by the Thermal Series. All of them have unique effects when detonated. We'll let you find out what each of them do
The Detonator can be used to activate Explosives from a safe distance. Just right-click an explosive with it, then switch the Detonator to \"detonation\" mode and right-click
Grades are a portable version of the classic TNT. To use them, just right-click to throw them. Careful, they'll explode on impact instantly
They Came from the Tunnels
A Worm Farm can be given a variety of plants in order to generate Worms
The Tackle Box can be used to store your Fishing Rod. Additionally, it can be used to upgrade/modify your rod. It can also act as a storage for your fishing bait
A Basic Watering Can won't be very quick, but in a pinch it can serve as a way to grow crops quicker
The Copper Watering Can is a better alternative to the basic one, storing more water
Holds even more water!
The Diamond Watering Can is a considerable upgrade to the quarz one, holding even more water and working on a larger area
Will give 20% chance to not use durability

Has 1000 durability. Will make the fish bite faster
Can be attached to a fishing rod to reduce the time required for a fish to bite. Can be obtained through a Worm Farm
Can be attached to a fishing rod to reduce the time required for a fish to bite. Unlike the Worm, this one can be obtained through fishing
Organic Compost will decay into Rich Soil when placed in the world, creating earth perfect for farming
The Stove will act as a very fancy Campfire. It will also allow you to cook up to 6 items at a time
The Skillet can be placed on top of a Stove. It will allow 1 stack of items to be cooked

The Cooking Pot is a working station where you can make all sorts of meals and dishes. The Cooking Pot has an internal inventory which will store the food after it was crafter. Most of the time, you'll need a bowl to get the food out of the Pot
The Cutting Board can be used to chop up items into smaller ingredients. Note that you'll need a knife or another tool for any operation

The Strainer Base can receive Bait and Strainers to obtain different items while it is placed in water. Different Strainers will have different amounts of durability. Additionally, some Strainers will be able to catch random items, while some Strainers will be able to catch mostly fish and other goodies
The Worm Bin can receive food items to turn them into Bait and Fertilizer. The Bait will be used in a Strainer Base, while the Fertilizer is just like regular BoneMeal
Guide to Bunny Hop

While you'll need some Calx of End to obtain the Enderslime required for the Slime Boots, the Slimesling can be made out of most of the Slime types existent. The combo made by these two items will allow you besically become a grass hopper
Any Slimesling
A Composter can be used to turn plants into Bone Meal. Since it is not that easy to obtain, we recommend to start exploring for Villages which might have some of these

A Feeding Through will allow you to breed your animals with ease. Just place it down near your animals, place some oftheir favourite food in it, and you're good to go. Keep in mind that there's a limited number of animals you can breed. After obtainin 32 animals in a 10 block radius, no breeding will occure anymore, but the animals will still eat the food
Very similar to the original Nature's Compass. However, with this one, you'll be able to locate dungeons
NoMoWanderer!
Don't like the Wandering Trader? No problem. Left Click for more info
When placed down, the Sign will prevent certain entities from spawning within an area of 8 chunks around it.
The Totem will prevent those same entities from spawning around the player's position.
Here are the entities that will be affected by these two gadgets:
- Vanilla Wandering Trader
- 老鼠模组的瘟疫医生
- 锦致装饰模组的红商人
抹泥铲是一个称手的建筑工具。在使用时，它会随机放置你快捷栏里的方块，这个用来制作有着不同纹理的建筑会很有趣
ftbquests.chapter.useful_items_2.title: 实用物品 - 2
Mana Traveller MkI: When worn in the Curio Belt slot, it will increase the wearer's speed by about 1.3 m/s, their jump height by 1 block, and grant them step assist if not sneaking. In addition the player will take 1 less point of fall damage. The Mana cost of these abilities is 2 Mana per second

Mana Magnet MkI: Any items in a 13x13 area around the player will be pulled towards them if they are not sneaking. Up to 200 items can be pulled at once. Items dropped by a player wearing this ring will not be pulled towards them for 5 seconds after dropping.Solegnolia flowers will prevent this ring from pulling items inside its range, as well as blocking the rings of players in its range.The ring will not pull relics, Mana-containing items like Mana Tablets, as well as Applied Energistics 2 crystal seeds like the Certus Quartz Seed

Mana Traveller MkII: It will slowly increase the wearer's speed as long as they are moving, up to 11 m/s speed. If the wearer stops moving, the speed boost will be lost. In addition the player is granted step assist and a 1.5 block jump height increase. The Mana cost of these abilities is 2 Mana per second

Mana Magnet MkII: It is an upgrade of the Ring of Magnetization, increasing the affected range from 13x13 to a 33x33 area around the player. Up to 200 items can be pulled at once. Items dropped by a player wearing this ring will not be pulled towards them for 5 seconds after dropping

Portable Mana Generator MkI: When worn, it slowly generates Mana and stores it in a Mana Tablet in the player's inventory at a rate of 2 mana per second[1]. It can be upgraded into the Greater Band of Aura, which generates Mana significantly faster
Portable Mana Generator MkII: It is an upgrade to the Band of Aura and generates Mana at a significantly faster rate (10 mana per second compared to the Band of Aura's 2 mana per second)
The Trinket Case is a storage item that can hold up to 24 Curios or Mana storing items like the Mana Tablet

When worn, the player will be able to swim like a fish. When in water, the player will receive the Dolphin's Grace and Conduit Power status effects indefinitely at the cost of Mana, allowing them to swim much faster and giving them improved vision, infinite oxygen, and faster mining speed. The ring drains Mana from a Mana Tablet in the player's inventory while in water, at a rate of approximately 70 Mana per second

It will switch the tool in the player's hand with the correct tool from their inventory if the one they are using is not used to mine the block effectively. It only works on Mana-using pickaxes, shovels and axes

When worn in the Baubles Ring slot, the player will be able to dodge left or right. To dodge, either double tap the left or right key (default: A/D), or double tap the forwards/backwards key (W/S) while holding left/right. Dodging moves the player 4 blocks left/right, each dodge will increase the player's exhaustion level by 0.3
When worn, the player acquires the Haste and will be able to mine faster, at the cost of using Mana from a carried Mana Tablet whenever the player swings their arm while wearing the Ring
The Invisibility Cloak when worn in the Curio Body slot, will turn the player invisible at the cost of 2 Mana/tick
抗击腰带会免疫一切伤害对玩家造成的击退效果
泰拉瑞……草！左键点击获取更多信息
The Thorn Chakram is a weapon made with Terrasteel.
When thrown, it will fly at a high speed, unaffected by gravity, bounces off blocks, dealing 12 points of damage to creatures it comes in contact with.

It has a 33% chance to poison the hit creature for 2 points of poison damage per second for 3 seconds. After 16 bounces or 3 seconds the Chakram will fly back to its thrower, ignoring all blocks and mobs.
Grass Cleaner 3000: The Horn of the Wild will break grass, flowers and crops in a 25x25x7 area around the player when the right-click is held down
Leaves Cleaner 100000: The Horn of the Canopy is a variation to The Horn of the Wild. This one will allow the player to break the leaves around them in a 19x19x15
Snow Cleaner 15000: The Horn of the Covering is a variation to The Horn of the Wild. This one will allow the player to break the snow around them in a 13x13x23

Pocket Ender Access: I will open the player's Ender Chest inventory at the cost of 250 Mana. If a Hand of Ender is present in the player's inventory, the Rod of the Shifting Crust will be able to use contents of their Ender inventory, using an additional 5 Mana per block swapped
The Fire Extinguisher: When worn by the player in the Curio amulet slot, it will extinguish the fire from them if they're not standing in a block that causes burns
Budget Frost Walker: Wearing it allows player to turn Water they walk over into Ice. When a player walks over Water, all Water blocks in a 7x7 square centered on the player will turn to Ice
Double Jump: When worn by the player in the Curio Amulet slot, the player will be able to double jump. Jumping in mid-air will nullify all fall damage and downwards momentum
简单飞机
你想要飞？唔……左键点击获取更多信息
简单飞机模组能够让你制作飞机和直升飞机等使用固体燃料驱动的飞行器。
飞机建构台是你能制作飞机或者直升飞机的地方。每一架飞机都需要熔炉引擎才能工作。
把你的飞机放下来之后，你得把这个引擎安装上去。要做到这一点，只需要用引擎右键点击飞机就行。
进入飞机里然后按“打开飞机引擎界面”键（你需要在控制菜单里与键位绑定），将会允许你使用燃料来启动你的飞机。煤炭或者可燃物都可以作为燃料。
运输
铁路模组不在这里。但是，运输模组是一个很好的替代品。左键点击以获取更多信息
Transport is a mod which adds the posibility of making modular carts, boats, new rails and steam locomotives.
To configure the rails added by this mod, you can use a Rail Breaker.
To find more about this mod, you can take a look at the Advanced Transport Manual.
工匠砧是升级版的工匠站。左键点击以获取更多信息
Similar to its counterpart, the tinker station, the anvil will allow you to assamble tool parts into tools.
However, the similarities end here, as the anvil is much more capable then the station. The anvil will allow you to assamble new types of tools, and upgrade them with more powerful modifiers.
Two more things. In The Decuriso Project, the anvil is craftable only with Brass Blocks. Also, to finish this quest, you'll have to make the Seared Brass Anvil, NOT the Scorched one.
X-ray is allowed here. Left Click for more info

Scanners have to be charged in order to be used. Further, they need at least one module in order to operate. Once the power and the modul is provided, just hold down right click to use the scanner. After a scan has been performed, results for your search will be provided in the world, based on what you've searched for.
The scanner can search for ores, blocks, mobs, entities and fluids.

A specific module will have to be installed for a certain search type. Let's say you want to find diamonds. The rare ores module will have to be installed in order for the scanner to search for that. To install modules, just shift right-click with the scanner in your hand.
Can be used to visualiza Immersive Engineering multiblock structures. Extremely helpful for building structures like The Coker, or for new players in general
Metal protects your base. These wires can be used to protect your base against mobs. These DO NOT count as a player kill. An Lv wire can be connected to electrify the created fence
电力保卫你的基地。左键点击以获取更多信息
The Tesla Coil can be used to damage mobs at a maximum range of six blocks, using electricity.
It will use 256 RF/tick passively. When it gives damage to a mob, it will use and additional 512 RF.
A redstone signal is required for the coil to work. This behaviour can be reverted through the use of a screwdriver.
The Coil has to modes. The high-power mode, and the low-power mode. You can switch between these two by shift right-clicking the coil when it's turned off.
The low-energy mode, will reduce the coil's working area. Additionally, it will use half of the required power.
哦，军团要塞2的旧时光。左键点击以获取更多信息

The Gun Turret is a stationary sentry that shoots bullets at any hostile mobs in its detection range and can be further configured by right-clicking to attack neutral mobs, animals, and even other players. A blacklist is toggled by default with the player's name already added. Other player names can be added so they would not be hit if the player wishes to use the target players option. Be warned, as turning off the blacklist will cause the turret to shoot any player within range.

The Turret must be supplied with cartridges and a constant Redstone Flux (RF) supply in order to function properly. RF is inputted through the sides marked with an orange dot. Finally, a Redstone signal is needed to activate the turret. When turned on, the turret will constantly consume RF, meaning unless the player has a reliable source of RF, it is recommended to turn the turret off until needed. The turret can store up to 1 stack of cartridges at any given moment and does not need a constant supply of ammo, only needing refills once in a while.
哦，军团要塞2的旧时光，现在有化学品了。左键点击以获取更多信息

The Chemthrower Turret is a stationary sentry that sprays liquid at any hostile mobs in its detection range and can be further configured by right-clicking to attack neutral mobs, animals, and even other players. Similar to the Chemical Thrower, a pilot light can be turned on to ignite the fluid sprayed by the turret. A blacklist is toggled by default with the player's name already added. Other player names can be added so they would not be hit if the player wishes to use the target players option. Be warned, as turning off the blacklist will cause the turret to shoot any player within range.

The Chemthrower Turret must be supplied with a liquid and a constant Redstone Flux (RF) supply in order to function properly. The liquid is pumped in through the back of the turret and RF is inputted through the sides marked with an orange dot. Finally, a Redstone signal is needed to activate the turret. When turned on, the turret will constantly consume RF, meaning unless the player has a reliable source of RF, it is recommended to turn the turret off until needed. The turret can store up to 4000 mb of liquid at any given moment and does not need a constant supply of liquid, only needing refills once in a while.
With this piece of paper, you can transfer your knowledge from Astral Sorcery, to other players. Effective only in multiplayer,duh
园艺玻璃罩
自动温室。左键点击以获取更多信息
The Garden Cloche is a machine added by Immersive Engineering. It is used to grow crops placed in it.

In order to grow, Water and Redstone Flux (RF) are required; Water can be input through the lower front, back, or bottom ports, and RF can be input through the top, or through the lower left and right sides (anywhere with an orange dot, except through the front center block). Water, despite being strictly required, acts as a small Fertilizer boost when refilled by your fluid input systems. This boost dies down until the next time it receives water.

When it has all its requirements, it will grow the crop, generating a product and its seeds, consuming 8 RF per tick. Items can be output through the front center side with the orange dot on it.Possible output configuration. IE conveyors also workVarious Fertilizers can be added to increase the growth modifier (production speed), including Bone Meal. The growth modifier is listed on the left side of the GUI, along with the amount of Fertilizer. It can be added through the lower front, back, or bottom ports. Using Fertilizer does not increase energy consumption.

Can be used to break the bond between you and the constellation you're attuned to. Just hold right click with it and you'll no longet be connected with the constellation that you chose to attune to. Keep in mind that this will remove all of your perks and points and you'll have to start from scratch (the other irradiant stars are disabled)

This tank can be worn like a chestplate and will allow you to breath underwater. To power the copper back tank, you'll have to place the tank on a powered shaft and wait for the tanks built-in vacuum system to grab all the required air from the atmosphere
Mark II - Test Flight
在你会走之前，你得会跑。左键点击以获取更多信息
The Brass Encased Jet is an upgrade to the Brass Exoskeleton.
While loosing some of the previously gained, protection and, also the haste and strenght effects, you gain the ability to fly.
To power the JetPlate, hold fuel (coal, planks) in your main hand, and the plate in the secondary hand and just throw the fuel.
You can hover in the air by holding down shift and space at the same time.
百变宝石
黎明、白天和晚上。左键点击以获取更多信息
There are three versions of these Dynamism Gems:
- Ourium Gem
- Ilium Gem
- Fengarum Gem
These can be obtained by throwing a Rock Crystal and a piece of Illumination Powder in a pool of Liquid Starlight.

After some time passes, a Gem Crystal Cluster will appear. You'll have to wait for this one to grow in order to harvest it. This crystal has three stages of growth. The third one will be the one at which you can harvest the crystal. You know your crystal is done growing when it reaches an Orange, Blue, or Light Gray color.
The final crystal's color will be determined by the time is reaches its final stage:
- If it grows during the day, it will be Orange.
- If it grows during sunrise or sunfall, it will be Blue.
- If it grows during night time, it will be a Light Gray.
They type of crystal you get, will influence the stats it will provide.

And now, what's teh deal with these crystals? Well, remember the fact that you just attuned yourself to a Constellation and that you have perks? Well, some of these perks will allow you to \"equit\" these crystals for better stats. To equip the cystals, you need to have them in your inventory and selectem them in the perks tree in the Astral Tome.
Keep in mind that this quest is here jsut to give you some information. Finishing it, doesn't actually mean you did what you had to.
知道了！
星座猎人。左键点击以获取更多信息
The Telescope will make your star-hunter life, so much easier.

Instead of holding the Looking Glass in your hand, now, you'll be able to place down the telescope and have a stable point from which you can look for the stars. Instead of dragging your mouse on the screen to searh the entire sky, now you'll have 'pages'. Just scroll through them to see different quadrants of the sky.
还有，不再需要按住潜行键了
镜子房间。左键点击以获取更多信息
The Lens is used to redirect Starlight in the Starlight network.
It can be linked to and linked from by the Linking Tool. It can accept Starlight from multiple sources, but it can only emit one ray.

The size of the Rock Crystal or Celestial Crystal is proportional to the amount of Lenses created, with the size being divided by 80 and rounded down to get the amount of Lenses, with one Lens being the minimum.
The purity and cutting of the Crystal used affect the amount of Starlight lost when transferring through the Lens.
奖励+，没有附魔？0_o左键点击以获取更多信息
The Resplandent Prism is a curios which will give you certain bonuses with or without enchantments.

When you make the prism for the first time, some bonuses will be granted randomly. If you don't like what you get, you can re-roll the bonuses by making a new recipe. You can see this new recipe by pressing \"u\" on the Prism.

The bonuses granted by the prism can either be used as they are, or they can require an enchantment in order to boost it. For exampe, a prism might require you having a tool with Efficiency in order to boost it to Efficiency II.
Sigil can be used in the perks tree in the Astral Tome to stop certain perks from being used. Why would you want that? Well, some perks involve 3x3 mining
Can be used to see the area of effect given by a Ritual
The Starlight that passes through this lens, will accelerate the growth rate of the crops that it touches, based on its intensity
允许星光透过方块
观星台会让你找到空中的暗淡星座
光之网。左键点击以获取更多信息
The PrismLens is similar in function to the Lens, but can redirect multiple beams from one prism.
The amount of Starlight is divided between all outgoing beams.
The only crystal property that affects the effectiveness of a PrismLens is Purity. Size does not increase the number of PrismLenses crafted, unlike Lenses.
信标里没有培根！左键点击以获取更多信息

The Ritual Pedestal is used to affect the area around it with the attuned Rock Crystal or Celestial Crystal, similar to a Beacon, but, well... better. A list of constellations and their given effects is listed below.
Virgo - Nearby living entities receive Regeneration. Plants experience accelerated growth
Capricornus - Hostile mobs and projectiles are repelled away from the Pedestal
Sagittarius - Hostile mobs near the Pedestal take damage over time
Aries - Breaks solid blocks near the Pedestal
Gemini - Entities near the Pedestal receive CREATIVE FLIGHT
Aquarius - Nearby animals \"shed\" their drops as if they were slain
Leo - Nearby blocks become their burnt or smelted counterparts
Scorpius - Machines experience bonus ticks and work faster
Libra - Hostile mobs do not spawn around the Pedestal
Taurus - Nearby Stone has a chance of becoming ore blocks (this includes coal, iron, gold, lapis, redstone, copper, aluminum, silver, nickel, uranium, tin and zinc)
Pisces - Nearby Water blocks become easier to fish
Cancer - Entities experience a higher chance of spawning, including hostile mobs
狙击精英mc版。左键点击以获取更多信息
The Precision Scope is an upgrade for the Railgun. Like all upgrades, it's applied to the Railgun in the Engineer's Workbench.

The Precision Scope gives the Railgun a scope for increased accuracy. Pressing the mouse wheel (middle mouse button) will activate it. When it's turned on, you can scroll up and down to zoom in, or zoom out. A maximum amount of 10x zoom is possible.

The Multitank is an upgrade for The Chemical Thrower. Crouch-scrolling when the Multitank modification is installed, will switch between the 3 possible tanks (each holds 2 buckets of fluid, making it higher total capacity than the Large Tank modification, which makes the original internal tank hold 4 buckets instead of 2). Must be applied in the Engineer's Workbench

The Focused Nozzle is an upgrade for the Chemical Thrower. It will decreases the spread and improves the range of the Chemical Thrower. This allows for increased precision. Must be applied in the Engineer's Workbench
无需加热，更多的能量。左键点击以获取更多信息
The Advanced Heat Sinks  is an upgrade for the Railgun. Like all upgrades, it's applied in the Engineer's Workbench.
The Additional Capacitors cuts the recharge time of the Railgun in half.
Can be applied to The Mining Drill, The Buzzsaw and The Chemical Thrower. It will increase the internal fuel tank by 2000 mb. Must be applied in the Engineer's Workbench

The Bayonet is an upgrade for the Revolver. It makes the Revolver gain the function of an Iron Sword; hitting a mob with it equipped inflicts 7 damage to the mob. Must be applied in the Engineer's Workbench

The Rockcutter Blade is one the heads available for the Buzzsaw. This Blade will turn your Buzzsaw into a pickaxe enchanted with Silk Touch at the cost of losing its wood chopping abilities. Must be applied in the Engineer's Workbench
The SawBlade is one the heads available for the Buzzsaw. This Blade will allow the Buzzsaw to chop entire trees from one fell swoop. Must be applied in the Engineer's Workbench

The Amplifier Electron Tubes is an upgrade for the Revolver. It makes the Revolver apply an electrical charge to any fired Cartridges. If it hits a mob, the mob will be shocked and become unable to move for about a second (or suffer severe speed reduction). Must be applied in the Engineer's Workbench

The Blade Quiver is an upgrade for the Buzzsaw. It will allow you to carry two more blades with you Buzzsaw. Just scroll while holding down shift to cycle between the blades. Must be applied in the Engineer's Workbench
The Extended Magazine is an upgrade for the Revolver. It makes the Revolver gain six more slots, for additional Cartridges. Must be applied in the Engineer's Workbench
This Drill Head will allow the Mining Drill to dig an area of 3x3x1. Must be applied in the Engineer's Workbench
This Drill Head will allow the Mining Drill to dig an area of 2x2x1. Must be applied in the Engineer's Workbench

The Pressurized Air Tank is an upgrade added by Immersive Engineering for the Mining Drill. The Pressurized Air Tank allows the Mining Drill to work underwater. More than that, it allows the Mining Drill to mine without the slowdown that usually occurs when mining in water. Must be applied in the Engineer's Workbench

The Additional Augers is an upgrade for the Mining Drill. The Additional Augers increase the attack damage of the Mining Drill. Each add one point. Unlike most upgrades, it is stackable, to three. It will also increase the mining speed of the Drill. Must be applied in the Engineer's Workbench

The Advanced Lubrication System is an upgrade for the Mining Drill and the Buzzsaw. Originally, the Advanced Lubrication System allowed the Mining Drill and the Buzzsaw to work slightly faster. In more recent versions, the upgrade has been changed, and reduces wear to the drill head and the saw blade, instead of increasing mining speed. Must be applied in the Engineer's Workbench
傀儡学，没有神秘时代和傀儡。左键点击以获取更多信息
The Livingwood Avatar can use certain rods, When provided Mana with a Mana Spreader.
- Rod of the Lands/Rod of Hightlands: Creates Dirt on the block in front of the avatar on random intervals
- Rod of the Skies: Launches nearby jumping players 35 blocks up
- Rod of the Hells: Creates a flame ring around the avatar, damaging and setting any creatures inside on fire
- Rod of the Bifrost: Creates a small platform under players in a 3x20 area in front of the avatar
- Rod of the Plentiful Mantle: Reveals ores in a 18 block radius around the avatar
- Rod of the Unstable Reservoir: Spawns homing missiles to deal damage to nearby monsters

Can be dyed to change the color of the bursts shot by a Mana Spreader. Also, just like all the other lenses, it can be combined in the crafting grid with another Lens and a Slimeball to obtain Lenses with unique effects
When placed on a Mana Spreader, it doubles the speed of Mana bursts it fires but each burst holds 25% less Mana and starts to decay after 8 blocks, losing Mana twice as fast
When placed on a Mana Spreader, it doubles the amount of Mana a Mana burst can carry, but the burst's speed is slightly lowered and when it starts to decay it will lose Mana twice as fast
When placed on a Mana Spreader, it will make the fired Mana bursts begin decaying twice as long as it usually does, however the burst will be 20% slower
When placed on a Mana Spreader, it increases the time before the fired Mana bursts start to decay by 10%, and makes the decay 5 times slower
When placed on a Mana Spreader, the Mana bursts it fires will be able to bounce off walls instead of dissipating on collision
When placed on a Mana Spreader, the fired Mana bursts will be affected by gravity and last 20% longer before starting to decay
魔力破坏方块。左键点击以获取更多信息
When placed on a Mana Spreader, the Mana bursts it fires will be able to break blocks they collide with, using 24 Mana from the burst.

When combined with the Warp lens into a Composite Mana Lens: Bore Warp, Force Relays and Pistons will not be broken and all mined blocks will be teleported to the spreader's location. A Warp Bore lens will not have those effects.
Spreaders equipped with this lens will ignore blocks in path to Mana accepting blocks like Mana Pools.
When placed on a Mana Spreader, the Mana bursts it fires will deal 8 points of damage to mobs they come in contact with, using 16 Mana from the burst

When placed on a Mana Spreader, the Mana bursts it fires will be able to go through blocks without dissipating, though the time before the burst starts to decay is reduced by 4 ticks for every tick spent inside a block
When placed on a Mana Spreader, the Mana bursts it fires will be attracted by Mana Pools and Spreaders in a 3 block range that can accept more Mana. The burst will be slowed near those blocks
When placed on a Mana Spreader, the fired Mana burst will explode if it collides with a block that cannot accept Mana. The explosion's power is proportional to the amount of Mana stored in the burst

When placed on a Mana Spreader, the Mana bursts it fires will cause nearby items, experience orbs, falling blocks and other Mana bursts to move in the same vector as the burst. It doesn't affect other Influence Mana bursts

When placed on a Mana Spreader, the Mana bursts it fires will turn the block they collide with into a falling block. The block must be able to be mined by an Iron Pickaxe, be affected by Silk Touch, directly above an air block, and cannot be a tile entity. The falling block behaves like falling Sand, dropping itself as an item when after it falls on a Torch or slabs

When placed on a Mana Spreader, the Mana bursts it fires will set the hit block on fire. If a Nether Portal would block the fire, the portal will be closed. If the burst hits an Incense Plate with an Incense Stick, it will ignite it
When placed on a Mana Spreader, the Mana bursts it fires will push the hit block, as long as the block can be pushed by a Piston. Unlike Pistons this lens can only move one block at the time

When placed on a Mana Spreader, the Mana bursts it fires will create a decorative Mana Flash of the same color as the burst. This block emits a light level of 15. If a burst from this lens hits one of these blocks, it will put it out
When placed on a Mana Spreader, the Mana bursts it fires will travel 3 times as fast and last 3 times as long before decaying, but have only 1/5 of the standard capacity
It can be bound to other blocks, and when a piston's force is applied to the Force Relay, that exact same force is applied to the bound block. Sticky Pistons DO NOT work with the Force Relay
Routing Everything
有些廉价的过滤器。左键点击以获取更多信息
物品分配机：
Unlike most machines, it does not consume any energy. The Item Router is used to organize and distribute items, used together with Conveyor Belts.

The Item Router has a GUI. It has a collection of slots for each side of the Item Router. Clicking an item into one of these slots will not put the item into the slot, but it will configure the Item Router to output that item through that specific side into an inventory when it enters the Item Router. If the Item Router doesn't have configuration for a specific item, it will output that item through a random side. The Item Router will only output items if it can output to an inventory (or Conveyor Belt), and if it cannot route an item, that item will not be accepted into the Item Router. Lastly, items cannot be outputted from where they entered.
The Item Router be configured to filter based on the Ore Dictionary, NBT values and damage values inside the GUI, per side.
流体分配机：
Unlike most machines, it does not consume any energy. The Fluid Router is used to organize and distribute fluids.

The Fluid Router has a GUI. It has a collection of slots for each side of the Fluid Router. Clicking a liquid container (like a Bucket) into one of these slots will not put the fluid into the slot, but it will configure the Fluid Router to output that fluid through that specific side into a tank when it enters the Fluid Router. If the Fluid Router doesn't have configuration for a specific fluid, it will output that fluid through a random side. The Fluid Router will only output a fluid if it can output to a tank, and if it cannot route a fluid, that fluid will not be accepted into the Fluid Router. Lastly, fluids cannot be outputted from where they entered.
The Fluid Router be configured to filter based on NBT values inside the GUI on each side.
高级布线。左键点击以获取更多信息
The Item Batcher is designed to collect a set of items from an inputting conveyor before sending them onwards, in order to transfer optimized batch sizes to machinery.

Place the block and open its interface to set a variety of filters. Any incoming items will be accepted into the slots directly below the filters, and the collected batch will only be output when all filters are satisfied. This behavior can be adjusted with the button labeled \"Output Mode\". The default behavior noted above is known as batched mode. In single mode, any item that satisfies its filtered quantity will be output instead.

Using the 9 buttons below the buffer, you can toggle through the colours of redstone wires. By attaching a Redstone Interface Connector, the Item Batcherwill send signals along the redstone wires when a filter is satisfied. This allows you to disable any extracting conveyors or producing machinery when your required amount of items is reached. Note that if multiple filters use the same colour, they all need to be satisfied for a signal to be sent.
Vegetal Demagnetizer: The Solegnolia will prevent the Ring of Magnetization from pulling items inside its range. Even though it can be linked to a Mana Pool, it does not use Mana

Decorative Blocks Generator: When supplied with Mana, it will convert all nearby Stone into a random type of decorative Metamorphic Stone The flower will convert all Stone at a speed of 10 blocks per second into a random type of Metamorphic Stone using 12 Mana per block. The affected area is a 17x17x11 cuboid centered on the flower. The Petite variant of the flower converts Stone in a 5x5x3 area instead Each type of Metamorphic Stone has an associated biome type— it will be 12 times more likely to generate if the biome where the Marimorphosis is placed has that type

Mob Slower: When supplied with Mana, it will apply Slowness 101 to all living entities (except players) in a 13×13×13 area around the flower (effectively stopping them in place), using 1 Mana per affected entity per tick
Enderman Catcher: If a Vinculotus is supplied with Mana, any Enderman in its functional range attempting to teleport will teleport to the flower. This can be useful to prevent enderman troubles

The Vegetal Fan: When supplied with Mana, it pushes away any items in front of it. The Daffomill can push items that are 3 blocks higher than the block it is placed on, 2 blocks lower and 2 blocks on each of its sides to the way it's facing. It will push blocks a maximum of 16 blocks. When the Daffomill is placed, faint smoke particles indicate the direction that it is facing. The Daffomill can be orientated by shift-clicking with the Wand of the Forest in function mode
The Clay Factory: When a Clayconia is supplied with Mana it will cause Sand to turn into Clay around it

Vegetal Animal Breeder: It will take any appropriate nearby food items on the ground and feed them to animals nearby for a small cost of Mana. According to the Lexica Botania this will \"put them in a better mood\"

Mob Poisoner: The Hyacidus will, when supplied with Mana, inflict nearby mobs with the Poison status effect and bring them down to 1 health point. Undead mobs, such as zombies and skeletons, are immune to poison, and are therefore unaffected

Vegetal Block Placer: The Rannuncarpus will place items in the world. However, it will only place blocks on top of a block of the same type as the one directly below the soil the flower is planted on. Supplying a Rannuncarpus with Mana will increase its range
Circular Repealer: The Jiyuulia will, when supplied with a small amount of Mana, keep any nearby mobs or animals out of a circular area
The Mana Fence: The Tangleberrie will, when supplied with a small amount of Mana, keep mobs and animals within a circle

Hopper ++: The Hopperhock will pick up items around it. Supplying it with Mana is optional, though doing so will increase its range. The default range of a Hopperhock is 6 blocks and can be increased to 10 when supplied with Mana
Growth Accelerator: When an Agricarnation is supplied with Mana it will cause growth ticks in an area of 5 blocks around it

External Heater: When supplied with a source of Mana this flower will do the opposite of its generating counterpart, the Endoflame, and use Mana to generate heat. Any Furnaces nearby the flower will be fueled and given an efficiency boost when it is supplied with Mana. Multiple Exoflames will have a stacking effect on efficiency of all Furnaces within their radius, and will allow more Furnaces to be fueled at once
The \"Gaia Boss Battle\" Help Unit: When supplied with Mana, it gives players around it the Regeneration status effect
Mystical Flowers Generator: When supplied with Mana by a Mana Pool within a 10 block radius, it will quickly grow mystical flowers in a 9x9 space around it on grass and dirt blocks
Vegetal Creeper Repealer 3000: The Tigerseye, when supplied with Mana, will cause Creepers to be unable to explode and run away from players
Vegetal Butcher: It is similar to the Bellethorne, but it only damages adult animals and requires 30 Mana per hit instead of 24. Its range and damage are otherwise identical
The Mana Sound Muffler: It reduces the volume of all sounds in a radius of 4 blocks by 85%. Even though it can be linked to a Mana Pool, it does not use Mana

Vegetal Mob Grinder: When a Bellethorne is supplied with Mana, it will attempt to damage a random nearby mob every 5 ticks, dealing 4 damage to it (increased to 20 against Witches) at the cost of 24 Mana. It will not attempt to damage mobs under Damage Immunity and will not consume mana if there are no valid targets in its area
Can be used to make the effects of a Ritual take place somewhere else from the Pedestal
能量随带随走。左键点击以获取更多信息
The Portable Generator is a basic, portable RF generating block that can use Gasoline as fuel.

The Portable Generator can store 8,000 mB of a valid fuel. It also has an internal buffer of 100,000 RF. If there is space in this internal buffer, the generator will automatically consume fuel at a rate of 5 mB per tick unless a redstone signal is supplied. It creates 128 RF/tick. When the device is picked up, either by breaking it or by holding shift and right clicking it, it will retain its stored fuel and energy, allowing the user to move it around quickly.
Unlike other Immersive Engineering machines, the Portable Generator does not require a power relay - instead, a LV Wire Coil or MV Wire Coil may be directly attached to the block.

Will make the items you pick up enter directly into the backpack. It has a small 3x3 filter. If any items are listed on the filter, you can either choose to pick up only those items, or to stop those items from being picked up
有更多的过滤选项
Items can be pipes in/out of backpacks using hoppers, pipes and more. This upgrade will allow you to filter what items can be piped into, or out of the backapack
有更多的过滤选项
Will allow your backpack to compress compatible items in a 2x2 grid
Will enable compacting for items in a 3x3 grid. Also has more filtering options
Will make your backpack void the items which are listed on a filter
有更多的过滤选项
The items listed on this upgrade's filter will be added to the backpack when you shift right-click a chest containing them. We recommand using this upgrade with the Refill Upgrade
有更多的过滤选项

Provides a 3x3 filter. When you shift right-click on a chest, the items listed on that filter will be placed from the backpack, into the chest. If no items are listed on the filter, all the items from the backpack will be transfered to that chest
有更多的过滤选项

Provides a filter with 6 slots. The items listed on this filter will be pushed to the player's hotbar. This can be useful if you're building something as you can store all of your building blocks in your backpack
Makes your backpack absolutely indestructible. Not even the void can destroy it
Will add a simple Furnace to the backpack

Provides filters for both smeltable items and fuels. With this upgrade, you can configure your backpack, so that it will constantly smelt iron using coal while you're mining. It's recommended that you use this upgrade with the Pickup Upgrade
Will add a Crafting Table to your backpack. No more portable crafting tables on sticks or other oddities!
在你的背包里加一个切石机
Has to be used with the Tank Upgrade. Will make the backpack outo-output any liquids to the fluid tanks located bellow the backpack. Remember you can place down backpacks with shift right-click
Will provide 4 filter slots. It will also allow the backpack to act more like a in-world pump and as a bucket
Will allow you to transfer your experiance into the backpack's tank. This upgrade has to be used with a Tank Upgrade
Handy Turtles
电脑完成一切。左键点击以获取更多信息
Turtles can be equipped with different tools in order to perform certain tasks and actions. While regular diamond tools will consume their durability, the tools equipped by a Turtle, won't.

All turtles can execute quite the same range of actions, but the tools they're equipped with, will allow them to execute their actions more quicker. For example, a Mining Turtle can chop down trees, but will do it quite slow comparing to a Felling Turtle.

Now, how do you use this things? Unfortunately, if you don't have some programming knowledge, things will be quite hard to handle. But we'll walk you through some of the basic things you can achieve with some turtles.
Mining Turtle - You can set it up to basically be a quarry or to do strip mining for you.
Melee Trutle - You can make a great mob grinder from it. Its kills do count as a player kill, so you'll be able to get xp while you're afk at a mob farm.
Digging Turtle - Will be efficient in ares where you need to break dirt blocks.
Felling Turtle - You can make a pretty great wood farm using this one.
Farming Turtle - Can be used to manage large crop fields.

Now, each turtle can be equipped with two tools/modules. This means that on a Turtle, you cna have a Pickaxe on one side, and a Crafting Table on the other. Such combos can be used in your advantage, to achieve behaviours like - a Mining Turtle can compress the cobblestone obtained while mining, in order to get more space.

To use the features mentioned previously, you'll have to use programs. Turtles come, by default, with some programs, but you can also make your own. While this might be a hard thing to achieve, you can also get pre-made programs from the ComputerCraft forum, through Pastebin.
To add a program to your Turtle, just type: pastebin get <pastebin file name> <whatever name you want the program to have>.

To make things more clear, Turtle/Computer programs are usually posted on Pastebin.com. Each program posted there, has a unique web adress which includes the name of that program. Simply copy that name formed of random characters and things should work.
Make sure to read the forum post of each program you want to use, to get a better understanding of how that program works.
知道了！
现代灯具

When supplied with power, the Powered Lantern will emita light source similar to Glowstone. However, it will keep mobs from spawning in a 32x32 area around them. The Floodlight, when provided with power will light an area of 32 blocks in front of it. With an Engineer's Hammer, you can rotate the Floodlight around. A redstone signal will be required to turn the Floodlight on. This behavior can be reversed with a Screwdriver
Mana Pylons can be used to boost the power of an Enchanting Table. Just two of these placed next to it, will boost the Enchanting Table's power to lvl 30

The Kitchen Floor is not just a decorative block, but also, a functional one. Since the blocks added by Cooking for Blockheads are meant to work with each other, you can use the Kitchen Floor to connect all of the blocks together

The Cooking Table can be used as a crafting station for you Kitchen. When it is part of a Kitchen which has lots of cooking ingredients, this Table will show you and will also allow you to easily craft complex recipes with those ingredients

The Oven is, essencially a large smoker which uses Cooking Oil as fuel. It can hold 3 stacks of food at a time and it can cook 9 items at a time. You'll eventually be able to upgrade it to use RF/FE instead of Cooking Oil, but for now, if you're planning on using this, make sure you've god Cooking Oil
厨房存储
厨房柜台和橱柜都可以储存用于配方中的食材。但是柜台意味着只能放地上，橱柜可以放在上面。使用厨房转角和悬挂厨房转角可以把低处的和高处的厨房部分相连接。冰箱跟橱柜和柜台很像，但它可以升级后可以提供冰来作为配方，但这就是后话了
The Toaster will take Bread and turn it into Toast without using any butter
罐中牛可以提供配方里所需要的奶。想要制作这个奇怪的物品，你需要把一头牛放在一个普通的罐子上，然后用一个铁砧砸向牛。打破罐中牛不会把牛放出来。
The Kitchen Sink can provide water to all the recipes that require it. You'll have to feed water into the Sink, as it will NOT act as an infinite water source
The Teru Teru Bozu can be used to reduce the amount of time in which Bad Weather will take place. You can also give them a Sunflower to make the Sun return
便携工作台：手持式工作台将使你能在任何地方打开标准3x3的合成表
即使在黑暗的地方也能发光

The Engineer's Goggles can be worn in the curios slots. Once they're equipped, and you're looking at a block from Create, information about the SU generated/consumed will be shown, along side with other useful information
Traveling without any risks. Left Click for more info
工程师天钩是一个移动工具，可以让你沿着电线，绳子，和电缆向上滑行很远的距离。
点击半空中的线，你就会和它连接，并从这里你将会顺着重力沿线滑行除非你使用了移动键。
沥青混凝土是沉浸原油模组里加入的方块、走在上面时，会提高你20%的移动速度

The Laboratory Furnace will be slightly faster then the vanilla Furnace. If a Thermal Plate from Powah is placed in one of the two auxiliary slots of the Furnace, and RF is provided, it will start to smelt items faster

The Small Electrical Furnace can take tiny amounts of RF to burn items just like a vanilla Furnace would. In its GUI, it has a tiny button with 4 positions. With it, you can choose how fast the Furnace will smelt items. The faster it goes, the more RF wil be used. Also note that, a certain level of RF has to be reached in order for it to work. Finally, this furnace will automatically pull items from the inventory adjacent to its input side (which is marked with a Blue dot)

The Factory Hopper is a smarted version of the vanilla Hopper. First, it has 18 slots and it can transfer a maximum amount of 32 items at a time. It also has options for different transfer delay, redstone control and more
变形工具是一个类似阿卡什宝典的工具。它能在里面储存很多扳手。如果你看着一个模组里的特定方块，变形工具就会变为加入在该模组里的扳手（如果它已经存过）
原始蒸汽轮机

The Steam Turbine is a revolutionary multiblock structure that will consume a maximum amount of 64mb/t of Liquid Steam to produce 1024 RF/t. This will allow you to turn the Steam you were previously producing directly into power, without any rotational force being involved. The output rate of 1024 RF/t will be split between the Turbine's two outputs. A Projector is adviced for building this Structure
柴油发电机
更多的结构。更多的RF。左键点击以获取更多信息

Construct the Diesel Generator, which can produce 2048 RF/tick using Diesel or Biodiesel as fuel. The generator has three outputs. Keep in mind that the 2048 RF output will be split between the generator's three outputs.
想要建造这个结构，使用工程师手册中提供的指南。你也可以使用投影仪来帮助你搭建多方块结构。
You might want to use the extreme sound muffler menu in your inventory to turn down the volume for the sounds produced by this machine. Trust us. This thing is LOUD.
自动化工程师装配台
Components can be mass-produced now. Left Click for more info
自动装配台是一个3x2x3的多方块结构，是工程师装配台的自动化版。

The orientation of the Conveyor Belts is important; they should \"flow\" to the front of the multiblock. After it is fully arranged, right-click the middle Treated Wood Slab with an Engineer's Hammer to complete the multiblock structure.
自动装配台需要RF才能工作。它的输入端是多方块结构中轻型工程块的位置。在自动装配台的GUI里，必须加入一张工程师蓝图才能运行。
结构如下图：
斗轮式挖掘机
矮人矿洞。左键点击以获取更多信息
斗轮式挖掘机消耗512RF/tick来产生大量矿物。要想恰当地使用它，你得用岩芯钻井寻找一处矿床。一旦你发现一处矿床，你就可以在它上面搭建斗轮式挖掘机并开始提取了。
这个多方块结构有两部分：
- 引擎
- 斗轮
想要建造这个结构，使用工程师手册中提供的指南。你也可以使用投影仪来帮助你搭建多方块结构。
斗轮式挖掘机的能量输入如下图所示：
锯木机
切割，现在用电了。左键点击以获取更多信息
锯木机是一台组装机器，用于把原木切割成整齐成堆的木板
机器分两个阶段运行，首先将原木去皮，然后用锯片将其切割成木板，每样东西都消耗RF/FE。
在切割过程中，你会得到可以用来做纸的锯末和以后会用到的其他产品。
润滑油
润滑油可以使例如斗轮式挖掘机，钻井等机器运行的更丝滑。这个任务只是为了提供一些信息
这个方块是防凋灵的
高级锯木机
橡木锯木机允许加工你将去的生物群系模组里的木头，这个理应能让你的建筑任务更轻松。与普通的锯木机不同，这一款是便携式的，所以你可以在你物品栏里打开它。只需要拿在手里潜行右键点击即可
ftbquests.chapter.useful_items_3.title: 实用物品 - 3
All the mobs I'll ever want. Left Click for more info
The Spawner is a machine added by RFTools Utility. It requires power, a syringe and at least 3 Matter Beamers in order to work properly.

The Syringe has to be placed inside the Spawner, only after it was filled with a mob's essence. To fill the Syringe, just hit the mob you want to spawn. You can check what essence level you have in the Syringe by right-clicking with it.
After the Syringe was filled, you can place it in the Spawner. Info about the required items should be provided on the right side of the Spawner interface.

The items listed there represent the Key Matter, the Bulk Matter and the Living Matter required for the Spawner to summon a creature. These types of matter must be provided to the Spawner through Matter Beamers (you can see the quest for these to learn more about them).
Items -> Matter -> Mobs. Left Click for more info
The Matter Beamer is used to transform certain items into different types of Matter. These types of Matter can be provided to a Spawner to summon certain mobs.

To properly use the Beamers, you need to connect them to a Spawer using a Smart Wrench from RFTools. Further, power and a redstone signal must be provided for the Beamer to work. After items are supplied to the Beamer, alongside the required power and the restone signal, a red beam should be appear between the Beamer and the Spawner to show that the're connected and working. Note that without the items, no red beam will be visible.
The Machine Infuser can be used to upgrade other machines from RF Tools. Place the machine in, provide power, some Dimensional Shards and watch how your machine is upgraded
Actually player kill. Left Click for more info
The Mob Masher is a machine added by MobGrindingUtilities which, unlike the Computercraft Turtles, needs just a redstone signal to operate.
Any mobs that come close to it will be rapidely killed, dropping items and xp which can either be collected by you, or by a Absoption Hopper.
Universal Hopper. Left Click for more info
The Absorption Hopper will pick up anything in its range. This also includes xp orbs which will be instantly turned into liquid xp in its inventory.
It is best used in a mob farm as it will pick up everything and it CANNOT accept any filters.
The Energetic Infuser will allow you to charge up to 9 items at a time. It can receive augments to charge items faster and hold more power

The Nullifier will delete all items and fluids that are transferred to it. When given items through its UI, it will keep those items until you decide to delete them. A filter can be applied to it in order to whitelist or blacklist certain items from being deleted
The Vacuumulator will act as a Hopperhock from Botania, excluding the fact that it is more techy. A filter can be applied to it in order to whitelist or blacklist certain items from being picked up
The Igneous Extruder can be used to generate infinite amounts of stone/cobblestone/basalt. You might be able to use it with the Matter Condenser to obtain Matter Balls or Singularities
The Thermal Water Pump

The Aqueous Accumulator will generate water for your needs. In order for it to work, at least two water source blocks must be adjacent to the Accumulator. Blocks present above or below the Accumulator will not count. Additionally, the Aqueous Accumulator can accept various augments in order to be more efficient

The Mana Collector is used to transport Mana from flowers to Sparks. It transfers mana from flowers much faster than Mana Spreaders. It allows the mana of flowers to be inserted into the spark network directly. You will need to attach a recessive spark augment to the collector for it to work
When worn, you'll be able to cast a very strong slowness effect on your enemies by simply hitting them. You'll also be immune to wall suffocation
When worn, you'll be immune to all kinds of fire damage. Additionally, you'll be able to set your enemies on fire when you'll hit them
Portable Mana Generator MkIII - An upgraded version of the Greater Band of Aura. This one will generate Mana at a much faster rate

When worn, this Ring will give you random gold items when you'll place Gold Blocks in the world. Note that, while using this ring, it has a random chance of becomming cursed, chase in which you'll have to cleanse it again
May luck be on your side. Left click for more info

The Dice of Fate is a powerful artifact dropped by the 2nd Guardian of Gaia. The dice is bound to the player it dropped for, and cannot be used by others. This item doesn't despawn when dropped onto the ground.

When used, the dice will turn into a random Relic not yet obtained by the player. Upon obtaining a relic the player will be awarded its respective advancement. If the player already has all the relic advancements, the dice will disappear instead.
What are these Relics?

These are legendary items with unique abilities which get bound to you. This means that you cannot share them with other players, they'll work only with you. Also, they're so unique that you cannot have multiple of them. If you lose one, it is gone forever, so be careful with them.
The Blessing of a lovely Goddess <3 Left Click for more info
The Fruit of Grisaia is one of the six Relics dropped by the Dice of Fate.
When used, it will use Mana to fill the player's hunger. About 50,000 Mana is necessary to completely fill the hunger bar.
Because Valhalla has an army <3 Left Click for more info
The Key of the King's Law is one of the six Relics dropped by the Dice of Fate.

When the right-click is held, it will spawn 20 weapon-shaped projectiles behind the player, using 150 Mana per projectile. Releasing the right mouse button when 20 projectiles are present or selecting a different item will launch the projectiles towards the targeted block, or 64 blocks in the direction the player is looking in if they are not targeting a block.

When a projectile hits an entity or a block, it will explode with strength of 3 (same as a Creeper), but will not damage blocks. A direct hit on an entity will deal an additional 20 points of damage to it. If a launched projectile does not hit anything, it will despawn after 10 seconds after being launched.
Home is home, what can you do? Left Click for more info
The Eye of the Flügel is one of the six Relics dropped by the Dice of Fate.
Shift right-clicking a block in the world will set the target location. The selected block is marked with a glowing outline while the Eye is held.

After holding the right-mouse button down for 2 seconds the player will be teleported on top of the bound block, using 10 Mana per block of distance from the target location. The player must be in the same dimension as the target block to teleport to it.
If the Eye of the Flügel is present in the player's inventory, their Flügel Tiara will not stop functioning when it runs out of charge—its Mana cost will be tripled instead.
With one of these, Ragnarok would've ended sooner. Left Click for more info
The Ring of Thor is one of the six Relics dropped by the Dice of Fate.
When worn in the Curios slot, an activated Terra Shatterer, or an Alf Shatterer will mine a much bigger area.
Well. You've got a small portion of the Allfather's power. Use it wisely. Left Click for more info
The Ring of Odin is one of the six Relics dropped by the Dice of Fate.
When worn in the Curios slot, you will gain an additional 20 health points and become immune to suffocation, drowning, fire, lava, starvation and fall damage.
Let's face it, Loki would've had more of these, duh. Left Click for more info
The Ring of Loki is one of the six Relics that can be obtained out of a Dice of Fate.

When worn in the Curios slot, you will gain the abillity to place multiple blocks at once in selected locations. Shift right-clicking with an empty hand will select a location. The first block selected is the source block. Selected blocks are marked with a glowing outline, the source block outline is larger.
Selecting an already chosen location will remove that selection. If the source block is unselected, all selections are reset.

Shift right-clicking with a block will attempt to place blocks on the relative positions to the selected block. The Mana cost of placing one block is, most of the time, equal to the amount of selected blocks.

The Black Hole Talisman can hold infinite amounts of one block. To use it, shift right-click on a block of your choice. After that shift right-click in the air to activate the Talisman. Now just watch how each block of that type gets automatically inserted into the Talisman. Right-click to place blocks with the Talisman. Place the Talisman in a crafting grid to extract stacks of that block

Mana Traveller MkIII: When worn, it will increase your movement speed by 2.8 m/s. Your jump height will be increased by 2, and will grant step assist if you're not sneaking. Lastly, you'll get 3 less points of fall damage
The Nimbus Amulet is an upgraded version of the Cirrus Amulet. It will allow you to triple jump
The Crimson Pendant will provide full-on protection again fire damage
When worn, this ring will increase the distance from which you can interact with any block by 3
When worn, the chance of spawning a Pixie while you're being hit, will be increased. This ring does not require the Elementium Armor to be worn in order to have an effect on you
The Flare Chakram is an upgraded version of the Thorn Chakram. It will set its targets on fire upon impact
The Flügel Tiara
Lovely Wings, make me FLYYYYYY :3 Left Click for more info

When worn, the Flügel Tiara will allow you to fly as if  you were in Creative Mode by consuming Mana from a carried Mana Tablet, or Band, at a rate of 70/tick. When in flight, white sparks trail behind you.
Note the you'll be able to fly for a limited amount of time. The Bar present the right side of your HUD will show you how long you can fly. Lastly, sprinting while flying, will boost you forwards.
The Charm of the Diva will turn the mobs that hit you against each other
The Cloak of Virtue will nullify all the physical incoming damage. After that, it will go on a cooldown for 10 seconds. You won't be protected from magic damage
The Cloak of Sin will damage all the nearby monsters for the same amount of damage that was dealt to you. After that, it will go on a cooldown for 10 seconds. It will not work with magic damage
The Cloak of Balance will halve the damage taken and deal the same amount of damage to the attacker. After that, it will go on a cooldown for 10 seconds. It will not work with magic damage
Building with DireWolf20. Left Click for more info
Are you tired of being able to place only 20 blocks in a straight line? You want more possibilities? More freedom? Congratulations! DireWolf20's Building Gadget is for you.

This nifty device allows you to place 31 block in a straight line. Just like with the Formation Wand from Astral Sorcery, you'll have to shift right-click on a block to select it as the template block. Aim at any other block in the distance and BOOM! You can build a straight line with ease. Additionally, the Building Gadget has a Settings Menu (assign it in your controls menu) where you can access more amazing features, such as:
- Anchor: Allows you to keep a steady preview of the blocks you're going to place next.
- Rotate: Works best with blocks such as the Glazed Terracotta or Stairs which can be rotated based on your position.
- Mirror: Will mirror blocks such as the Glazed Terracottas on the X axis.
- Undo: Explains itself.
- Raytrace Fluid: Will not build over liquids.
The Building Gadget has more building modes which you can combine to obtain unique patterns and structures.
Exchanging with DireWolf20. Left Click for more info
This one will be a replacement for the Conversion Wand from Astral Sorcery.
Unlike the Conversion Wand, which has a maximum working area of 11x11, the Exchanging Gadget has a maximum working area of 15x15.
It has multiple exchanging modes which can be combined to obtain unique patterns.

Lastly, unlike other gadgets, this one does not have an \"Undo\" option. Also be careful with what blocks you're exchanging, as this gadget will not allow you to pickup blocks like you would with a Silktouch enchanted tool. Well, of course, that's unless you actually enchant the gadget with Silktouch, which you can absolutelly do.
Copy-Pasting with DireWolf20. Left Click for more info
The Copy-Paste Gadget can be quite useful especially when dealing with lots of multiblock structures, which spoiler: you'll do a lot.

This gadget has two modes. The Copy mode will require two positions to be set using a regular right-click for the first one, and a shift right-click for the second one. After you've selected the area of block you want to copy, by using the Setting Menu of the Copy-Paste Gadget, you can switch to Paste mode.

In this mode you'll be able to set a position for the copy of the previously selected structure. You can also anchor the preview to make sure you're pasting in the right place (if you end up pasting in the wrong place, no problem, this gadged also has an \"Undo\" option).
Lastly, when placing a copy of something, you can quickly see a list of the required blocks and their exact amounts by holding shift while hovering your cursor over the gadget.
Destroying with DireWolf20. Left click for more information
Want to build something, but there's just too much terrain around and you just can't work with it? Fear not. The Destruction Gadget is for you.
First, understand that this gadget will NOT give you the blocks it will break, so if you want tons of dirt/cobblestone, you might want to use some tools.

Now, unlike other gadgets, you'll have to shift right-click with this one to select the area in which you want it to work. Additionally, from the Settings Menu, you can configure the gadged so it will void only liquids. To do that, just enable the \"Ray-Trace Fluid\" and the \"Fluid Only\" options. The first one will tell the gadged \"Hey, see that liquid? Yeah, don't ignore it\", while the second one will tell the gadged \"Ok, see the liquid? Interact only with it and ignore the solid blocks around\". If only the \"Ray-Trace Fluid\" option is enabled, the Destruction Gadget will void all the blocks found in its working area.
Finally, of course, this gadget will also void all the fluids it will interract with.
It is very similar to the Entropy Lens, however, instead of an explosion, it will create a festive firework which has the color of the mana burst
The Flare Lens will disable the ability of the Mana Spreader to launch mana bursts, and, in exchange, it will allow it to constantly launch a decorative flare
This is an interesting one and it can be used to make traps. This Lens will allow a Mana Spreader to shoot a mana burst only if a mob or player is in the way of the Spreader

The burst launched by the Mana Spreader which has this lens will turn all the other Mana Spreaders towards their origin point when it hits them. On short, with this you can make a Mana Spreated turn towards another Mana Spreader

As its name might suggest, the Paintslinger lens will allow you to color mobs/entities that can receive color. Just combine the lens with a piece of dye, pop it on a Mana Spreader, then launch a burst at a block such as Wool or at a Sheep and they should get the color of the burst

The Warp Lens has to be used with a Force Relay and a Bore lens. Using a Slime Ball you cna combine the Bore Lens with the Warp Lens in your crafting grid. Place this Composite Lens on a Mana Spreder Facing a Force Relay. The said Relay will teleport the mana burst it receives to the block it's bound to. See the 'Force Relay' quest in 'Useful Items - 2' to learn more about the Relay
Making Factories I

Unlike a regular Mekansim experiance, in this pack the Factories can be made only with the Tier Installers. This tier will turn any Mekanism Machine into a Basic Tier Factory which can perform three tasks at a time. For example, a Basic Smelting Factory will be like three Energized Smelters into one. Also, most Factories will have an \"Auto-Sort\" feature, which will evenly spread the input items through the machine's input slots
More RF? More sawdust. Left Click for more info
Sick of machines that take up too much space? Still want more planks from your wood? Congrats! The Thermal Sawmill is for you.
By using a set of very well positioned blades, the Sawmill will cut a verious amount of logs to produce more planks and sawdust.
This machine can receive augments for better processing speeds, less RF/FE consumption and more.
What's the best coal? RF, duh. Left Click for more info
Smelting items just got much more easier, of course, through the power of RF.
The Redstone Furnace will use fair amounts of RF to smelt your items. It can receive certain augments to smelt items faster or consume less power.
Cooling 101, no nitrogen. Left Click for more info

Ok, time for another upgrade. Until now, you've been using mechanical presses or other means to obtain metal gears and rods. Well now, while you can use a Multiservo Press to obtain those gears a little more easier, you can also use the Blast Chiller to obtain rods more easier.
This machine will use a set of powerful fans, accompanied by a ice, to freeze any liquid metal that gets inside of its internal tank.
This machine can receive augments for better processing speeds, less RF/FE consumption and more.
Potions, no brewing stand, cuz 21st century, duh. Left Click for more info

The Alchemical Imbuer can be compared to an electric Brewing Stand. However, you'll quickly find out that this machine has its own advantages and disatvantages. One of the disadvantages is the fact that you won't be ablte to brew all the existing potions. One advantage is that, you can make 4 bottles of potion out of one ingredient, instead of 3.
This machine can receive augments for better processing speeds, less RF/FE consumption and more.
Smash, crush and pulverise. Left click for more info
When it comes to crushing, this machine is essential in any factory.
The Pulverizer will use fair amounts of RF to crush ores and other goodies to effectively double them.

Like the Induction Smelter, the Pulverizer can use different Catalysts to increase the amount of resources given by a crushed ore. This machine can be augmented to run faster, use less power and keep its catalysts more often.
Gardening Cloche 3.0. Left Click for more info

Gardening Cloche, the a Botany Pot; what's next? Simply, the Phytogenic Insolator. By consuming water, RF/FE and seeds, this machine can mass grow crops, plants and tress, just for you to use as you please.
This machine can receive augments for better processing speeds, less RF/FE consumption, perpetual processing and more.
Mekanism's Smelter. Left Click for more info

This is machine will be the electric furnace provided by Mekanism. At first, you might think that this thing is faster then the Redstone Furnace you've probabily been using until this point. Well, unfortunately, this will not be the case. The Smelter is quite slower the one provided by Thermal.
\"Even when fully upgraded?\"
A fully upgraded Redstone Furnace (1 Resonant Component + 3 Flux Linkage Amplifiers) will be twice as fast as a fully upgraded Energized Smelter.
\"Ok... then.. why should I build this thing?\"

Like with any other Mekanism machine, this one can be turned into a Factory using a Basic Tier Installer. Factories can execute 3, 5, 7 or 9 operations at a time, depending on their tier. So yeah, that's it. If you want to plan ahead, make this Smelter. You won't regret it probably.

Ps: When no upgrade are applied on both sides, even the Basic Factory (which executes three operations at a time) is faster then a Redstone Furnace. When full upgrades are applied on both sides, the Basic Smelting Factory and the Redstone Furnace, will be kinda equal.
Precision cutting, no danger. Left Click for more info

This will be a major upgrade from the Thermal Sawmill. While the Sawmill was able to cut logs into multiple planks, this machine will also be able to recycle lots of wood products into their original plank components.
Rotational force forever. Left Click for more info
The Centrifugal Separator is essentially an electric centrifuge which can be used to separate certain items such as alloy dusts, into their original components.
Like other machines from the Thermal Series, it can receive certain augments for better processing speeds and so on.
Mix mix mix. Left Click for more info
The Combiner can be used to obtain certain dyes. You can also use this machine to obtain ores if you need them.
Ore processing upgraded. Left Click for more info
The Purification Chamber is a component of the Mekanism ore processing system. It can be used to make either an ore tripling system, or an ore quintupling system.
This machine will take ores and shards and will turn them into clumps. These clumps can be processed into ingots.
Chemicals to the rescue. Left Click for more info

The Chemical Injection Chamber is, in many ways, similar to the Fluid Encapsulator from the Thermal Series, as it will infuse certain items with certain gases. Unlike the Encapsulator, this machine uses gases and not liquids.
The Chemical Injection Chamber is part of the Mekanism ore processing system and it is used to obtain five ingots from one ore.
Void Miner: Will use mana to turn the nearby Stone blocks into random Ores
Botany Pots
Gardening Cloche 2.0 - A Botany Pot can be used to grow crops in it. They'll harvest and replant the crops automatically
Botany Pot
Making liquid XP. Left Click for more info
This amazing furnace uses 40RF/t to smelt 3 items at a time and produce 2mb of Essence per smelted item.
This liquid Essence can be used later in a Liquid Encapsulator to start producing Bottles of XP.
Note that later, there will be better ways of producing this Essence, so don't worry.
Electricity can turn into heat. Left Click for more info
The Resistive Heater is a condensed, coiled resistor capable of converting electrical energy directly into heat energy.

The Resistive heater has a basic UI with a text input slot. Here, you'll be able to select the power consumption rate of the Heater. After providing power to it, the Heater will start to generate heat which can be transfered to any other machines that might require it
Pack your things. We're moving out! Left Click for more info
Cardboard Box is used for boxing up other blocks to move them, preserving the inventory while being moved.

By right clicking it on any block, tank, chest or machine, you wrap it in this protective box that you can break while still preserving everything about that block, tank, chest or machine. This includes its inventory, orientation, installed upgrades, and more, and should work with any block from any mod. You can later place it safely into the world. Sneak right-click to unwrap a box, causing the Cardboard Box to drop as an item.
